name: Pesto Torta (Layered Spread)
author: Valerie B
summary: A super cream cheese and pesto spread. Very simple, but a great flavor combination.  It looks very pretty for Christmas parties. Serve with crackers or bread.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers
directions: Slice each block of cream cheese lengthwise
Line a loaf pan with plastic wrap
Place one strip of cream cheese between two layers of plastic wrap
Flatten the cheese with a rolling pin until it is the same size as the loaf pan's bottom
Place the cream cheese into the loaf pan
Spread pesto (about 1/4 inch thick) over the cream cheese
Repeat this process until all of the pesto and cream cheese has been used
The final layer should be cream cheese
Fold the plastic wrap over the final layer, and refrigerate for at least 3 hours
When you are ready to serve, gently remove the torta from the loaf pan
Place drained, roasted red peppers over the top of the torta
